loginPage.title: O AMOGELESEGA GAPE!
loginPage.subtitle: Tswee-tswee tsenya dintlha tsa gago go tsena.
loginPage.emailPlaceholder: Tsenya aterese ya gago ya imeili
loginPage.welcomeImageAlt: Kamogelo ya go Tsena mo Mavito
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: O tsene sentle, mme ga go na tokene e e amogetsweng. Tswee-tswee ikgolaganye le thuso.
loginPage.errorDefault: Go tsena go paletswe. Tswee-tswee tlhola dintlha tsa gago.
loginPage.errorUnexpectedFormat: Phoso ya go tsena (maemo {{status}}). Sebopego sa phoso se se sa solofetswang.
loginPage.errorWithStatus: Go tsena go paletswe (maemo {{status}}). Tswee-tswee leka gape.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Go diragetse phoso e e sa itseweng ya neteweke. Tswee-tswee leka gape.
